title.narrative: Sierra Leone Mineral Sector Technical Assistance

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to build the Recipient's capacity to improve the management and regulation of the mining sector.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Sch 2, Sec 1, C1 | Description :Annual Work Plan and Budget submitted to the Bank by Dec 1 each year | Frequency:Yearly
Finance Agreement :Sch 2, Sec I, D 1; Sec IV, B 1 | Description :HR Policy adopted, and Implementation and Financing plansdeveloped for new staff | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Sch 2, Sec I, E 1 | Description :MMRPA to develop legal instruments, including relevant amendments tolegislation and regulations, for the management of environmental and social impacts of mining sector activities | Due Date:30-Dec-2011
Finance Agreement :Sch 2, Sec II B 4 | Description :Establish a computerized financial management system and appoint auditors |Due Date :30-Jul-2010
